ds.invalid_grow_item: §6You need another type of growth artifact:§r %1$s
death.attack.starDrain: %1$s had their life and energy drained by magic.
death.attack.waterBurn.player: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: Deep inside you, the red-hot lava begins to roar. You have become a §cCave dragon.§r
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You feel the need for raw meat and are covered in grass scales. You have become a forest dragon. You have chosen to be a §aForest dragon.§r
ds.sea_dragon_choice: The stormy sea and fishes beckon you. Now you are a §3Sea dragon.§r
ds.choice_human: You have chosen to become a human.
ds.wings.nohunger: You are too hungry to fly
ds.you.have.no.wings: You have §cno wings§r. You need to talk to the Ender dragon.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now get out of here!
ds.gui.tab_button.2: Lore will not be available anytime soon
ds.gui.tab_button.3: Skin customization will not be available anytime soon
ds.skill_cooldown_check_failure: The ability is not ready yet! ({0})
ds.skill.nofly: This skill cant be used while flying!
ds.skill.level.down: Downgrade the skill and refund {0} levels
ds.skill.description.storm_breath:
Thunderous breath that deals {0} damage.

With prolonged exposure, the "Charged" effect is applied.

Charged opponents electrocute each other.
ds.skill.description.ball_lightning: Shoot balls of lightning, dealing {0} damage in an area.
ds.skill.description.revealing_the_soul:
Gives the player and those who are nearby a bonus to the experience drops.

The effect lasts {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.sea_eyes: Gives the player the ability to see clearly underwater for {0} seconds
ds.skill.description.sea_magic:
Concentrated knowledge that you can use repeatedly.

You currently have {0} mana points.
 - {1} from Sea Magic
 - {2} from level
ds.skill.description.sea_athletics:
Running on surfaces in a fitting environment grants a Speed effect.

Duration {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.water: You have built up a bigger tolerance to the dry air and can now be out of the water {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.spectral_impact: Gives {0}% chance that your melee attack will ignore enemy armor.
ds.skill.description.sea_claws_and_teeth:
Your claws and teeth deal more damage from birth, and allow you to mine many blocks with your bare paw.

But this makes ranged weapons and horseback riding inaccessible to you.
ds.skill.description.sea_wings:
Magical knowledge that can only be obtained from the Ender Dragon.

She will hear your every word.

Enable flight mode [{0}]
ds.skill.description.sea_dragon:
Sea dragons eat seafood, are good at mining loose blocks, swim fast and do not suffocate underwater.

Their magic controls lightning.
ds.skill.description.poisonous_breath:
Poisonous Breath deals {0} damage.

With prolonged exposure, the "Drained" effect is applied.

Drained opponents take lethal damage over time.
ds.skill.description.inspiration: Inspires the players around you, giving them a bonus to mining speed.
ds.skill.description.hunter:
Allows you to become invisible on contact with tall grass.

The first hit from stealth has its damage multiplied by {0}.

Also grants speed while active.

After receiving or dealing damage, the effect ends.
ds.skill.description.forest_magic:
Concentrated knowledge that you can use repeatedly.

You currently have {0} mana points.
 - {1} from Forest Magic
 - {2} from level
ds.skill.description.forest_athletics:
Running on surfaces in a fitting environment grants a Speed effect.

Duration {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.light_in_darkness: You can now stay in the dark for up {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.cliffhanger:
Reduces fall damage.

You can now safely fall up to {0} blocks.
ds.skill.description.forest_claws_and_te:
Your claws and teeth deal more damage from birth, and allow you to mine many blocks with your bare paw.

But this makes ranged weapons and horseback riding inaccessible to you.
ds.skill.description.forest_wings:
Magical knowledge that can only be obtained from the Ender Dragon.
She will hear your every word.

Enable flight mode [{0}]
ds.skill.description.forest_dragon:
Forest dragons eat raw meat and have the advantage of harvesting wood.

They are subject to the magic of poisoning, and are not harmed sources like berry bushes.
ds.skill.description.fear_of_dark: You get nervous when the light is less than {0} if you stay there for too long.
ds.skill.description.nether_breath:
Real fire is gradually ignited from your mouth, dealing {0} damage.

nWith prolonged exposure, the "Burned" effect is applied.
ds.skill.description.fireball:
Just a ball of fire.

Deals {0} damage.
ds.skill.description.strong_leather: Empowers players and nearby entities, giving them additional {1} defense units for {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.lava_vision: Gives you the ability to see clearly in lava for {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.cave_magic:
Concentrated knowledge that you can use repeatedly.

You currently have {0} mana points.
 - {1} from Cave Magic
 - {2} from level
ds.skill.description.cave_athletics:
Running on surfaces in a fitting environment grants a Speed effect.

Duration {0} seconds.
ds.skill.description.contrast_shower: You can now survive in the rain for up to {0} seconds
ds.skill.description.burn:
Your target has a {0}% chance to receive the "Burned" effect.

The "Burned" effect deals damage when the target moves.

The faster the movement, the more damage is done.
ds.skill.description.cave_claws_and_teet:
Your claws and teeth deal more damage from birth, and allow you to mine many blocks with your bare paw.

But this makes ranged weapons and horseback riding inaccessible to you.
ds.skill.description.cave_wings:
Magical knowledge that can only be obtained from the Ender Dragon.

She will hear your every word.

Enable flight mode [{0}]
ds.skill.description.cave_dragon:
Cave dragons like charred meat and are good at mining stone blocks.

Fire and lava are their native elements.
ds.skill.description.hot_bloode: Being in contact with water deals {0} damage to you every {1} seconds.
ds.endmessage.1: Have you come here for the wings, {0}? Get out, before it's too late.
ds.endmessage.2: This is my land, {0}, show some respect. Go away, but first answer, why have you come here. Is it for wings?
ds.endmessage.3: You have gone through lot to get here, {0}, what do you wish?
ds.altar_dragon_info.cave_dragon.2: §2■ Features:§f§r fire resistance, pickaxe claws, fire magic, faster movement on cave blocks.
ds.altar_dragon_info.forest_dragon.2: §2■ Features:§f§r soft fall, axe claws, poison magic, faster movement on forest blocks.
ds.altar_dragon_info.sea_dragon.2: §2■ Features:§f§r underwater breathing, shovel claws, electric magic, faster movement on sea blocks.
